schema.name: Healthyfied Beef Yakiniku

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the red onion and mince the garlic.
In a bowl, mix the beef brisket yakiniku with salt, ground pepper, and sesame oil.
Preheat a grill pan over medium-high heat.
Cook the beef brisket yakiniku for about 3-5 minutes on each side or until desired doneness. (cooking time: PT10M)
Remove the beef from the grill pan and let it rest.
In the same pan, add the sliced red onion and cook until soft and golden. (cooking time: PT5M)
Serve the beef yakiniku topped with cooked onions and a side of freshly minced garlic.

schema.description: Our Healthyfied Beef Yakiniku is perfect for those following a high-protein, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. This delicious recipe marries the savory taste of beef yakiniku with health-conscious ingredients, making it an ideal choice for anyone looking to enjoy a classic dish with a healthier twist. Dive into the world of healthy recipes without compromising on taste.
